name: Senior Research Project in Equity Studies
description: Supervised research project undertaken in the final year of study. Students attend a seminar to present their on-going research and to discuss the research process. Final projects will be presented in a public student research symposium. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.
prerequisites: NEW240Y1, 1.0 FCE Equity Studies Core Group 300+ level course, and a minimum cGPA of 3.0.
